Text: The sample opened ok, though a bit dark, so I downloaded the video.   It's an avi. The file won't open in VLC, Adobe Premiere Elements, Windows Media Player, or Ulead Video Studio 11. Says there is an error with the file?  Don't bother. I'll be interested to hear if anyone else gets this to play.
